Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Boolean value to specify if this Work Schedule Calendar is opted into Static Scheduling for Workday Scheduling.
The date on which the patterns begin cycling, if using Pattern Schedule Events. This setting does not affect the week start day of the My Schedule report.
Number of Weeks for Work Schedule Calendar, if using Pattern Schedule Events.
Work Schedule Calendar Event data.
Boolean value for enabling Worker Editing Options.
Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Scheduled and Non-Scheduled Days for schedule pattern.
Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Number of Scheduled Days for schedule pattern.
Boolean value to enable Minimum/Maximum Number of Hours per Day and Minimum/Maximum Number of Hours per Week for schedule pattern.
Numeric value for Minimum Number of Hours per Day for schedule pattern.
Numeric value for Maximum Number of Hours per Day for schedule pattern.
Numeric value for Minimum Number of Hours per Week for schedule pattern.
Numeric value for Maximum Number of Hours per Week for schedule pattern.
Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Daily Start and End Times for schedule pattern.
Boolean value for enforcing Uniform Start and End Times for schedule pattern.
Minute-precision Time value for Flexible Start Time for schedule pattern.
Minute-precision Time value for Flexible End Time for schedule pattern.
Boolean value for allowing Worker to have Meals for schedule pattern.
Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Meal Start and End Times for schedule pattern.
Numeric value for Minimum Meal Duration in minutes for schedule pattern.
Numeric value for Maximum Meal Duration in minutes for schedule pattern.
Instance data for Schedule Pattern. This schedule pattern may be linked to schedule changes that a manager made. If you update this schedule pattern, you will also be deleting the manager's changes.
Instance data for Flextime Bands. Flextime Bands can be used alone, with calendar events, or with patterns.
Once a Work Schedule Calendar has been marked as inactive, it can't be edited or made active again.
Work Schedule Calendar inactivation date. Do not set directly; the value will be ignored. Instead use the "inactivate" field to inactivate a Calendar.

Allow_Meals.description: Boolean value for allowing Worker to have Meals for schedule pattern.

Biweekly_Calculation_Start_Date.description: Reference to Biweekly Calculation Start Date for Work Schedule Calendar.

Change_Daily_Start_and_End_Times.description: Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Daily Start and End Times for schedule pattern.

Change_Meal_Start_and_End_Times.description: Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Meal Start and End Times for schedule pattern.

Change_Number_of_Scheduled_Days.description: Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Number of Scheduled Days for schedule pattern.

Change_Scheduled_and_Non_Scheduled_Days.description: Boolean value for allowing Worker to Change Scheduled and Non-Scheduled Days for schedule pattern.

Condition_Rule_Reference_Condition_Rule_.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Condition_Rule_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Configurable_Calculation_Period_Referenc.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Day_Breaker_Divides_Reference_Day_Breake.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Day_Breaker_Divides_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Day_Breaker_Reference_Twenty_Four_Hour_T.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Day_Breaker_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Description.description: Text description of Work Schedule Calendar.

Enable_Hours_Restrictions.description: Boolean value to enable Minimum/Maximum Number of Hours per Day and Minimum/Maximum Number of Hours per Week for schedule pattern.

Enable_Worker_Editing_Options.description: Boolean value for enabling Worker Editing Options.

Enable_for_Static_Scheduling.description: Boolean value to specify if this Work Schedule Calendar is opted into Static Scheduling for Workday Scheduling.

Flexible_End_Time.description: Minute-precision Time value for Flexible End Time for schedule pattern.

Flexible_Start_Time.description: Minute-precision Time value for Flexible Start Time for schedule pattern.

Flextime_Band_Data.description: Instance data for Flextime Bands. Flextime Bands can be used alone, with calendar events, or with patterns.

Inactive.description: Once a Work Schedule Calendar has been marked as inactive, it can't be edited or made active again.

Inactive_Date.description: Work Schedule Calendar inactivation date. Do not set directly; the value will be ignored. Instead use the "inactivate" field to inactivate a Calendar.

Maximum_Meal_Duration.description: Numeric value for Maximum Meal Duration in minutes for schedule pattern.

Maximum_Number_of_Hours_per_Day.description: Numeric value for Maximum Number of Hours per Day for schedule pattern.

Maximum_Number_of_Hours_per_Week.description: Numeric value for Maximum Number of Hours per Week for schedule pattern.

Minimum_Meal_Duration.description: Numeric value for Minimum Meal Duration in minutes for schedule pattern.

Minimum_Number_of_Hours_per_Day.description: Numeric value for Minimum Number of Hours per Day for schedule pattern.

Minimum_Number_of_Hours_per_Week.description: Numeric value for Minimum Number of Hours per Week for schedule pattern.

Name.description: Text name for Work Schedule Calendar.

Number_of_Weeks.description: Number of Weeks for Work Schedule Calendar, if using Pattern Schedule Events.

Pattern_Schedule_Event_Data.description: Instance data for Schedule Pattern. This schedule pattern may be linked to schedule changes that a manager made. If you update this schedule pattern, you will also be deleting the manager's changes.

Pattern_Start_Date.description: The date on which the patterns begin cycling, if using Pattern Schedule Events. This setting does not affect the week start day of the My Schedule report.

Schedule_Summary.description: A short description of the work schedule calendar or its restrictions to display to workers when they edit their work schedules.

Uniform_Start_and_End_Times.description: Boolean value for enforcing Uniform Start and End Times for schedule pattern.

Work_Schedule_Calendar_Group_Reference.description: Reference to the Work Schedule Calendar Group for the Work Schedule Calendar.

Work_Schedule_Calendar_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Work_Schedule_Calendar_Reference_Work_Sc.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Work_Week_Start_Day_Reference_Day_of_the.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Work_Week_Start_Day_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
